Hotel.name: Hotel Carlton on the Grand Canal

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Carlton on the Grand Canal, you'll be centrally located in Venice, steps from Scalzi Bridge and Papadopoli Gardens. This 4-star hotel is close to Rialto Bridge and St. Mark's Basilica.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 150 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This hotel also features babysitting/childcare and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and a meeting room.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Scalzi Bridge - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Papadopoli Gardens - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Scuola Grande di San Giovanni Evangelista - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Tolentini - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Piazzale Roma - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Riva de Biasio Waterbus - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Labia - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Church of St. Roch - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Guglie Bridge - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Guglie Waterbus - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Mary of the Friars - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Confraternity of St. Roch - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Frari Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Fondaco of Turks - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Venetian Museum of Natural History - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Carlton on the Grand Canal is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Carlton on the Grand Canal is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi.

Room 1
Check in time: 2pmCheck out time: 12pm
Notice
Please note that the guests are required to pay City Tax fee of EUR 4.00 per person per night.


Local Charges: €4.50 city tax per person per night


The cities of Rome, Florence, Venice and Padua apply a tax to all visitors who stay overnight in hotels, BBs and apartments. This tax is not included in the selected room and is payable locally directly to the hotel. At the moment the tax is between 2 and 5 euros per person per night depending on the city and category of the hotel.


Unless otherwise indicated, charges do not include the local tourist tax to be paid directly to the hotel.
